name: Mrmine-macro
tagline: trying to make a macro for mr.mine web game
body:
### Welcome to MR.MINE MACRO page
Under the frustration of constantly checking the Mr.Mine tab every one or two minutes, I've decided to make a macro that will do the ridiculously repetitive and boring work for me. 

### MAIN FEATURES
I have made several versions of the macro of my own each improved compared to the previous one. I am saving and organizing my progress in this github. But the main features of my current progress is as follows:
* automatic selling
* automatic looting
* show record of looting
* open config windows for these features with a simple hotkey

### WHERE TO DOWNLOAD AND USE IT?
Currently(2014-01-27) the latest version is ver.5.1 stored in 'take3' branch. The tutorial for applying macro is [here](https://github.com/kwagjj/mrmine-macro/blob/take3/how_to_run_macro.md) and the folder containing the files of ver.5.1 is [here](https://github.com/kwagjj/mrmine-macro/tree/take3/versions/5.1)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
